title: America the Dead
description: Book 3 of the White Flag of the Dead Series. John Talon and his son have survived the Upheaval, the event which saw the dead rising to feed on the living. After two years of fighting off the worst the infection had to throw at them, a new danger emerges which threatens to take apart their small hold on humanity and the one chance they have to rebuild the country.Sometimes the biggest threat to humanity isnâ€™t the living dead, and the survivors will learn if they will live in America the Beautiful or America the Dead.
author: Joseph Talluto
